translation.es: Soy los ojos de la selva.

translation.en: who witnessed the coming of man...
translation.es: presencié la llegada de los hombres.

translation.en: and darkness come to our lands.
translation.es: y la oscuridad llegar a nuestro hogar.

translation.en: I saw the tiger, Shere Khan,
and breaking the jungle's ancient law.
translation.es: ...e infringir la antigua ley de la selva.

translation.en: I saw the jungle place its hopes
translation.es: vi a la selva depositar sus esperanzas

translation.en: the like of which it had never seen before.
I've never seen a man-cub before.
translation.es: Jamás había visto un cachorro humano.

translation.en: What are we going to do with it?
-It's a lovely night, isn't it? -What is it that you want, Tabaqui?
What's that I smell? Fresh kill?
If it's bones you're after, look elsewhere.
We have enough mouths to feed.
He sounds in ill temper tonight.
That he does. That he does.
I found the man-cub! I found the man-cub!
A council must be held if we are to keep him.
translation.es: Debemos pedir quedarnos con él ante el consejo.

translation.en: -Keep him? -Don't let him out of your sight.
translation.es: ¿Quedarnos con él? No lo pierdas de vista.

translation.en: Nisha, you have called council. What's the matter at hand?
translation.es: Solicitaste una reunión del consejo. ¿Qué sucede?

translation.en: -That's not a wolf. -That doesn't belong here.
translation.es: No es un lobo. No pertenece aquí.

translation.en: Well, this is most unusual indeed.
Nisha, you wish to raise this cub as if he were your own?
This cub was not born among us.
So, who here speaks for the cub?
The law states that the life of a cub
translation.es: La ley establece que la vida de un cachorro

translation.en: Who else will speak for the cub?
-Bagheera... -He's not a wolf. He has no say.
translation.es: - Bagheera... - No es lobo. No tiene voto en esto.

translation.en: He was the teacher of your cubs. That makes him a member of the pack.
translation.es: Es el maestro de sus cachorros. Pertenece a la manada.

translation.en: Bagheera, have you lost your mind? A man-cub living in a jungle?
translation.es: Bagheera, ¿te volviste loco? ¿Un cachorro humano en la selva?

translation.en: There is no one to come looking for him.
This is not your concern, Shere Khan.
translation.es: Esto no te incumbe, Shere Khan.

translation.en: I have already tasted its mother's blood.
translation.es: Ya probé la sangre de su madre.

translation.en: Your right according to whose law?
You do not want to challenge me.
is under the protection of the pack.
translation.es: ...está bajo el cuidado de la manada.

translation.en: Should you decide to take me,
As long as I am leader,
this part of the jungle is closed to you.
translation.es: no podrás acceder a esta parte de la selva.
No serás el líder por siempre.

translation.en: The day you miss your kill,
translation.es: El día que tu presa se escape,

translation.en: You will treat him as you would your own.
translation.es: Lo criarás como si fuera tuyo.

translation.en: As long as I am alive,
the pack will stand by the man-cub.
But we never do it for sport.
translation.es: Pero jamás lo hacemos por deporte.

translation.en: We look them in the eye
How old is the jungle, Bagheera?
The jungle has been here since before you were born
why am I different to the other wolves?
translation.es: ¿Por qué soy diferente de los otros lobos?

translation.en: That's why you need special training.
You know what your trouble is?
how many ants can you fit in your mouth?
and your mouth is really big.
translation.es: y tu boca es muy grande.

translation.en: -Why do I have to do this? -'Cause I said so.
translation.es: ¿Por qué debo hacerlo? Porque lo digo yo. Dime las tres leyes.

translation.en: Tell me the three laws, now.
translation.es: Porque lo digo yo. Dime las tres leyes.

translation.en: "No wolf shall have contact with man."

translation.es: - ¿Qué le pasó a tu cola? - ¡La siguiente!
"Ningún lobo cazará los animales de los humanos.

translation.en: Above all, the cow, which is sacred!"
translation.es: Sobre todo la vaca, ¡que es sagrada!".

translation.en: Did it fall off? Is that why you don't have one?
translation.es: ¿Se te cayó? ¿Por eso no tienes cola?

translation.en: What? Why haven't you got a tail?
I don't know. I never really thought about it.
"No wolf shall kill man in the jungle, for killing man only brings danger."
translation.es: "Ningún lobo matará humanos en la selva. Eso generaría peligro".

translation.en: Oh, well. Least you know your laws.
Now, we just got to get you to run as fast as the other wolves.
translation.es: Ahora debes lograr correr tan rápido como el resto.

translation.en: All right, that's enough for today, Mowgli.
Straight back to the caves. No wandering. Run like a wolf, d'you hear?
translation.es: Ve directo a la cueva. Nada de deambular. Corre como lobo, ¿me oyes?

translation.en: Mum taught me how to hide. She shows me loads of tricks.
translation.es: Mamá me enseñó a hacerlo. Me enseñó muchos trucos.
Dice que el resto puede confundir

translation.en: That's why they have a go at me sometimes.
translation.es: Por eso se burlan de mí.

translation.en: Come on. I'll race you home.
What did Baloo make you do today?
Put a scorpion on me and told me not to move.
translation.es: Me puso un escorpión y me dijo que no me mueva.

translation.en: Baloo says that to all of us.
translation.es: Baloo nos dice eso a todos.

translation.en: Your brother tells me you're getting faster.
translation.es: Tu hermano dice que corres más rápido.

translation.en: He can nearly keep pace with me.
Yeah, he should just race with his freak friend!
translation.es: Sí, debería correr con su amigo raro.

translation.en: It's only natural they spend so much time with each other.
translation.es: Con razón pasan tanto tiempo juntos.

translation.en: You shouldn't let them pick on you like that.
translation.es: No dejes que te hagan eso.

translation.en: I meant what I said to Mum. You are getting faster.
translation.es: No le mentí a mamá. Corres más rápido.

translation.en: Your father was never much of a runner either.
translation.es: Tu padre jamás fue muy rápido.

translation.en: It's true. I was the slowest in my group.
translation.es: Es verdad. Era el más lento del grupo.

translation.en: I never thought I was gonna compete in the Running. I was sure I would fail.
translation.es: Jamás creí que pasaría la carrera. Creí que reprobaría.

translation.en: -You're going to be late. -Have a good hunt, Father.
Before you know it, you'll be coming along with me. All of you!
In the jungle, we all hunt.
You see what that means? It means that you...
translation.es: Eso significa que ninguno de ustedes

translation.en: you don't want to get caught.
That's why you can't join the pack
translation.es: Por eso no pueden unirse a la manada

translation.en: until you have passed the Running-- Pay attention!
translation.es: hasta no superar la carrera... ¡Presta atención!

translation.en: The Running is the hunt where you...
translation.es: La carrera es la cacería en la que ustedes

translation.en: You all know Bagheera, don't you?
In the Running, Bagheera will hunt you,
translation.es: En la carrera, Bagheera los cazará,

translation.en: But I've never had one of my cubs fail.
translation.es: Pero ninguno de mis cachorros reprobó.

translation.en: And I'm not gonna start now.
and they can't even speak proper.
translation.es: y ni siquiera hablar bien saben.

translation.en: -I think they're funny. -There's nothing funny about them.
translation.es: Creo que son graciosos. No tienen nada de gracioso.

translation.en: You keep away, do you understand?
-I'm not afraid of them. -Only fools feel no fear, Mowgli.
translation.es: No les tengo miedo. Solo los tontos no sienten miedo, Mowgli.

translation.en: Oh, they can't even lay eyes on her.
Oh, you don't want to meet Kaa.
is as old as the jungle.
translation.es: es tan antigua como la selva.

translation.en: The cow had been killed and left there to be found.
translation.es: Mató a la vaca y dejó el cuerpo para que lo veamos.

translation.en: -It's the tiger! He's come back! -Only Khan would kill man's cattle.
translation.es: ¡El tigre regresó! Solo Khan mataría el ganado de los humanos.

translation.en: -One man-cub will bring more men! -It's Shere Khan!
translation.es: - ¡El cachorro humano atraerá más humanos! - ¡Es Shere Khan!

translation.en: Akela, we knew this would happen! We told you!
translation.es: Akela, sabíamos que pasaría esto. ¡Te lo dijimos!

translation.en: Can't you see, Akela, the man-cub is putting us all in danger!
translation.es: Akela, el cachorro humano nos pone en peligro.

translation.en: -You were wrong to ever take him in! -We should give him to the tiger!
translation.es: ¡Jamás debimos aceptarlo! ¡Debimos habérselo dado al tigre!

translation.en: I will see to this matter.
Shere Khan wants to bring war to the jungle.
translation.es: Shere Khan quiere inciar una guerra en la selva.

translation.en: With man? Is he out of his mind?
This is his way of bringing chaos to the pack.
translation.es: Es su manera de generar caos en la manada.

translation.en: -Khan wants the boy. -We can protect him.
translation.es: - Khan quiere al niño. - Podemos protegerlo.

translation.en: You know there is only one way to protect him.
translation.es: Sabes que hay una sola manera de protegerlo.

translation.en: He must go to the man village.
translation.es: Debe ir a la aldea de los humanos.

translation.en: You're forgetting, Bagheera, this was always more than just a good deed.
translation.es: Bagheera, olvidas que esto fue más que una buena acción.

translation.en: Man is taking more of it as each season passes.
translation.es: Cada temporada, los humanos se apropian más de ella.

translation.en: may just be our only hope of survival.
The jungle is no longer safe for him.
translation.es: La selva ya no es segura para él.

translation.en: -The pack won't accept him. -They will if he passes the Running.
translation.es: La manada no lo aceptará. Lo aceptará si aprueba la carrera.

translation.en: Of course he's not ready. He's not a wolf!
translation.es: Claro que no. No es un lobo.

translation.en: Can you run as fast as a wolf?
translation.es: ¿Puedes correr tan rápido como un lobo?

translation.en: You've got hands with fingers on the ends, so let's use them.
translation.es: Tienes manos con dedos en las extremidades, úsalas.

translation.en: Do you know why those men have come?
They've come to hunt the tiger that steals their cattle.
translation.es: Vinieron a cazar al tigre que roba su ganado.

translation.en: -Will they kill him? -It won't be easy.
the jungle is no longer safe for you.
translation.es: ...ya no estás a salvo en la selva.

translation.en: But if you were to be in a place where Shere Khan would never go,
translation.es: Si estuvieras en un sitio al que Shere Khan jamás iría,

translation.en: Where does Shere Khan never go?
I have seen the way you look at the village.
He wants your blood, little brother.
It was Shere Khan who killed your man-parents
translation.es: Shere Khana mató a tus padres humanos

translation.en: and now he wants to kill you.
translation.es: y ahora quiere matarte a ti.

translation.en: be able to join the pack.
you will go to the village.
Don't worry. I'll kill your tiger.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Mataré al tigre.

translation.en: How many's he taken this time?
Did you smell the blood, man-cub?
-The creature that did that to your tail. -It's called "fire."
translation.es: La criatura que le hizo eso a tu cola. Se llama fuego.
Es más caliente que el sol.

translation.en: And it's quicker than the panther.
translation.es: Y más veloz que la pantera.

translation.en: Your kind use dark magic, man-cub.
But I always wake up a hyena.
translation.es: Pero siempre me despierto como hiena.

translation.en: You should try and get some sleep.
You'll want to be rested for tomorrow.
For the others to see me as an...
This is my chance to prove myself.
translation.es: Esta es mi oportunidad de probarlo.

translation.en: To prove that I'm one of them.
translation.es: De probar que soy uno de ellos.

translation.en: Don't ever let anyone make you think otherwise.
translation.es: Jamás dejes que te hagan creer lo contrario.

translation.en: You will always be my son, Mowgli.
You are about to take part
translation.es: Están a punto de formar parte

translation.en: in one of our oldest traditions.
Those of you who pass the test...
Bagheera will perform his task as chaser.
I must warn you, Bagheera has been told not to hold back.
translation.es: Se los advierto. Se le indicó a Bagheera que no se contenga.

translation.en: I told you, never let your guard down.
translation.es: Te dije que jamás bajes la guardia.
Sabe que soy el más débil.

translation.en: I saw that look in your eye
when you were standing over him.
I did what I did because I had to.
translation.es: Hice lo que tenía que hacer.

translation.en: Do you think I am stupid?
Why did you have to do that?
Why can't you see how much danger he's in?
The pack would have protected him!
Khan will kill him and tear the pack apart.
translation.es: Khan lo matará y destruirá a la manada.

translation.en: You are not the only one
All you care about is that he passed.
translation.es: Lo único que querías es que pase la prueba.

translation.en: That is because it's my job!
Mowgli's been taken by the monkey-people!
And how much chaos you brought upon the pack.
translation.es: Y cuánto caos generaste en la manada.
Dejen en paz al cachorro humano.

translation.en: We'll get to join them soon enough.
Mum says some wolves just need more time. It doesn't mean we're not good enough.
translation.es: Mamá dice que algunos necesitan más tiempo. No significa que no seamos buenos.

translation.en: Hey, why don't we have our own night hunt?
translation.es: ¿Y si hacemos nuestra propia cacería nocturna?

translation.en: Just you and me. What do you say?
translation.es: Solo tú y yo. ¿Qué te parece?

translation.en: You've been spending a lot of time on your own since the monkey-people.
translation.es: Desde lo de los simios, pasas mucho tiempo solo.

translation.en: It's not good to be alone.
Wolves are supposed to be with other wolves. I'm not a wolf.
translation.es: - Los lobos deben estar juntos. - No soy un lobo.

translation.en: Of course you are, Mowgli. You're the best wolf I know!
translation.es: Claro que sí, Mowgli. Eres el mejor lobo que conozco.

translation.en: Why do you always want to be around me, Bhoot?
I don't have any friends neither.

translation.es: Pero nos tenemos el uno al otro.

translation.en: And we're kind of same, you and me.
Because you're special and I'm special.
We'll never be one of them! We're freaks!
It's just something your mother tells you to make you feel better about yourself
translation.es: Tu madre te lo dice para hacerte sentir mejor

translation.en: Are you afraid of me, man-cub?
Is it true that you know the past and the future?
translation.es: ¿Es verdad que conoces el pasado y el futuro?

translation.en: What is it you want from me,
Why did you save me from the monkey-people?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me salvaste de los simios?

translation.en: Why do you think the elephant saved you from the tiger pit?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que el elefante te salvó de la fosa del tigre?

translation.en: The whole jungle has been watching you, man-cub.
translation.es: La selva entera te observa, cachorro humano.

translation.en: Even you must know you are unusual.
translation.es: Incluso tú debes saber que eres extraño.

translation.en: I think we can both agree, Mowgli,
that you are something the jungle has never seen before.
translation.es: de que eres algo que la selva jamás ha visto.

translation.en: What will you say then, man-cub?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que dirás, cachorro humano?

translation.en: You have no right to be here, Shere Khan!
translation.es: No tienes derecho a estar aquí, Shere Khan.

translation.en: Well, I think you'll find I stay where I please.
translation.es: Descubrirás que estaré dónde me plazca.

translation.en: You kill man's cattle. You poison the jungle.
translation.es: Mataste el ganado. Contaminaste la selva.

translation.en: You're the reason man is here!
But you permitted man to live among you.
translation.es: Pero tú permitiste que un humano viva entre ustedes.

translation.en: You pretend he is a wolf.
translation.es: Tú haces de cuenta de que es un lobo.

translation.en: When we both know that is the one thing he will never be.
translation.es: Ambos sabemos que jamás lo será.

translation.en: But you're no longer leader now, are you?
Akela's missed his kill! Akela's missed his kill!
As is our tradition, whoever defeats me...
translation.es: Según la tradición, quien me derrote...

translation.en: will become leader of the pack.
If I ever see you here again, I will set your hide ablaze
translation.es: Si vuelvo a verte aquí, ¡te prenderé fuego!

translation.en: You have brought the pack great shame.
I have not come to rescue you.
I've come to tell you to stay.
translation.es: Vine a decirte que te quedes aquí.

translation.en: You must stay in the village. You must not come back to the jungle.
translation.es: Debes quedarte aquí. No puedes regresar a la selva.

translation.en: -But the jungle is my home. -No, it isn't. Not anymore.
translation.es: - Pero la selva es mi hogar. - No, ya no.

translation.en: You will learn to understand their ways.
How do you know? You've never spent a day outside the jungle.
translation.es: ¿Cómo lo sabes? Jamás estuviste fuera de la selva.

translation.en: I bear the marks of the collar.
I lived in a king's palace in a cage just like this.
translation.es: Viví en el palacio de un rey, en una jaula como esta.

translation.en: I only heard stories about the jungle.
translation.es: Solo había oído historias sobre la selva.

translation.en: And I thought I could teach you. I thought I could...
translation.es: Creí que podría enseñarte, que podría...

translation.en: and I spent my entire life fighting.
Looks like we've both got the same enemy.
translation.es: Parece que tenemos el mismo enemigo.
Está bien, no te hará daño.

translation.en: Here, you can keep this one.
Those of us who still stand by Akela, anyway.
translation.es: Al menos los que apoyamos a Akela.

translation.en: They come in groups, in the night.
translation.es: Vienen en grupo, por la noche.

translation.en: We've been pushed to the very edge of the jungle.
translation.es: Quedamos restringidos al límite de la selva.

translation.en: And Khan won't stop killing man's cattle.
translation.es: Y Khan mata el ganado de los humanos.

translation.en: We're afraid of what man might do to us.
translation.es: Tememos qué puedan hacernos los humanos.

translation.en: They didn't need me when I was cast out.
translation.es: No me necesitó cuando me echó.

translation.en: when will you kill the tiger? He has killed many cattle.
translation.es: ¿Cuándo cazarás al tigre? Mató al ganado.

translation.en: Knows how to cover his tracks.
I did get one of his tusks, though.
I have never missed a kill since.
translation.es: Ninguna presa se me volvió a escapar.

translation.en: I have no doubt, I will get him.

translation.es: es mi colección de animales personal.
Dios sabe que no lo soy.

translation.en: I will show you the hunter who took this...
translation.es: Te diré qué cazador se llevó tu colmillo...

translation.en: if you help me rid the jungle of the tiger.
translation.es: ...si me ayudas a liberar a la selva del tigre.

translation.en: Shere Khan has brought us nothing but chaos.
translation.es: Shere Khan no generó más que caos.

translation.en: Akela, we must kill the tiger.
than break with the laws of the jungle.
translation.es: a infringir las leyes de la selva.

translation.en: But I'm not bound by those laws anymore, Akela,
translation.es: Pero esas leyes ya no me afectan, Akela.

translation.en: and this is not the jungle you once knew.
I looked you in the eye and saw no fear.
translation.es: no vi miedo en tus ojos.

translation.en: I believed then that one day you would bring peace to the jungle.
translation.es: Creí que algún día traerías paz a la selva.

translation.en: But you have become a man now, Mowgli.
translation.es: Pero te convertiste en un hombre, Mowgli.

translation.en: But neither am I a wolf.
-Which of you will follow me? -We can't, Mowgli.

translation.es: La ley de la selva es sagrada.

translation.en: using a man's tool to do your killing.
translation.es: Usas el arma de los humanos para matar.

translation.en: What would Baloo and Bagheera think?
You know, I can still hear
the night I took her life.
Forgive me for doubting you, Mowgli.
translation.es: Perdóname por haber dudado de ti, Mowgli.

translation.en: With the tiger and the hunter now gone,
translation.es: Sin el tigre ni el cazador,
la selva se alejó de la oscuridad

translation.en: had given the jungle a voice.
And for as long as he stood watch,
translation.es: Y mientras estuviera bajo su protección,

translation.en: it would speak a lasting peace.
